Text: bad quality, track duplicated twice, tracks mis-named
but still, thanks for sharing ulysses56. And to anybody reading, this CD has some awesome tracks. For example "soy como soy" (which is mis-named in this torrent)

In addition to the problems codecopter mentions, this torrent is missing track 2 of the CD. It took longer to rename the tracks than it did to download.

Still, there are some amazing songs on this CD.

Also, if you like the music on this CD, you should check out Putumayo - Acoustic Brazil.

Thanks again for uploading these Ulysses.
